overview:
Maddy Reddy is the founder/CEO of Content Syndicate.

Maddy began his career with technology reporting for Cyber Media India, India ‘s largest technology publishing firm at 19 - straight out of high-school. In 1999, he was the founding editor of ZDNet’s Indian operations, which was then acquired by CNET in 2000 and subsequently by CBS Corporation in 2008.

His work profile includes having been an Associate Editor at Silicon India; News Editor at Lyceum Media; Technology Editor at ITP, the Middle East’s largest publishing firm and Managing Editor for IDG Middle East - the world’s largest IT publishing firm. He also helped recently set-up the Europe, Middle East and African operations for Ramky Group - a US$450 million environmental and infrastructure services firm.

Over the past 12 years, he has worked in senior editorial and managerial positions for leading media groups in Bangalore, Mumbai, London and Dubai.

Maddy holds a Bachelors degree in Commerce from Osmania University, India and an MBA from Cardiff, UK. His hobbies include trivia, traveling, comics, technology and reading.
